body.name: LEGO Icons Flower Bouquet Building Decoration Set - Artificial Flowers with Roses, Home Accessories or Valentine Décor for Him and Her, Gift for Valentines Day, Botanical Collection for Adults, 10280
deliveryMessages: FREE delivery Monday, February 19. Order within 1 hr 8 mins
features: Mixed Flower Bouquet - Features 15 stems with flower and leaf varieties like roses, snapdragons, poppies, asters, daisies, and grasses in this adult building set
Realistic LEGO Flowers - First ever LEGO artificial flower bouquet, created from 17 new elements with realistic petal shapes and colors for home decoration
Customizable Arrangements - The flowers have posable petals and leaves, with adjustable stem lengths to create wonderful arrangements for home decoration or as a unique gift

Alternative to Real Flowers - Great for a Valentine gift as well as a present for Mother's Day, Woman's Day, Easter, birthdays, anniversaries, or just because. This botanical collection set is a thoughtful present
LEGO Botanical Collection - One of many unique adult building sets from the LEGO Botanical Collection, including Wildflower Bouquet (10313), Dried Flower Centerpiece (10314), and Orchid (10311)
Various Stem Lengths - The stems come in a variety of lengths, with the snapdragon measuring over 14 in. (36 cm) high; this adult building set contains 756 pieces
Unleash Your Imagination - Let your imagination bloom to create a stunning, unexpected, vibrant display that never withers, perfect for any occasion like Mother's Day or Valentine's Day
body.description: Giving and receiving beautiful flowers is such a joy. If you’re looking for a flower gift with a difference, the LEGO Flower Bouquet (10280) is an inspired choice. Whether you’re treating a loved one to a Valentines Day gift, or are looking for your next creative project, this flower bouquet model building kit lets you relax, unplug and create something wonderful. When complete, the impressive flower display brings a touch of fun and color to any room. The adjustable stems make it easy to tailor the arrangement for any vase or container. Each detail of the bouquet is made from LEGO components – all customizable to create a unique display. Most of the flowers have petals that can be positioned in different ways so you can have fun designing different arrangements. Take the stems apart and recombine to adjust the height and shape of your flowers. Part of the LEGO Botanical Collection for adults, this set includes several elements made from a plant-based plastic, produced using sustainably sourced sugarcane. Contains 756 pieces.

manufacturerProductDescription.media_text: Let your imagination bloom Create a beautiful bouquet from LEGO pieces for a stunning display that never withers.

LEGO Flower Bouquet Discover your favorite blooms Varieties include LEGO ‘roses’, ‘daisies’ and ‘asters’. A range of shapes and colors 15 stems with a mix of flower and leaf varieties. Plants from plants Includes elements made from sustainable materials.
A unique gift Make a change from the usual gifts by surprising a friend or loved one with this LEGO Flower Bouquet.
Inspirational design In this set, the LEGO designers have created a building experience, with a stunning display piece for flower lovers to enjoy.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on February 4, 2024
reviews.reviewTitle: 5.0 out of 5 stars Great gift for a significant other!
reviews.reviewText: Very fun gift to put together with a significant other. Lots of flowers, took a good amount of time to build. Cool designs!

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on January 31, 2024
reviews.reviewTitle: 5.0 out of 5 stars A new hobby
reviews.reviewText: This was my first LEGO set, so the packaging, instructions and even the whole premise was all new to me. It was easy to build but so satisfying and so much fun! The kit is split up into 3 sections, so I did one section a day to spread out the build and keep it organized. It gave me something to look forward to and was a really relaxing way to unwind at the end of each day. I loved seeing my bouquet grow throughout the weekend and the final result is beautiful for display. I love plants but I’m allergic to most real flowers, so this is a nice alternative to add some color and whimsy to my shelves. I’ll absolutely be buying the other botanical sets.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on June 19, 2023
reviews.reviewTitle: 5.0 out of 5 stars LEGO Flower Bouquet - A Lasting Blossom of Love and Fun!
reviews.reviewText: The LEGO Flower Bouquet set is a delightful surprise! Not your traditional bouquet, this one is assembled with love, brick by brick. The diverse array of blooms it offers is outstanding - from roses to daisies, every flower is uniquely charming.Building it was a breeze. With clear instructions and a fun assembly process, it's a 2/10 in difficulty but a 10/10 in enjoyment! Once put together, it's a decorative gem. The vibrancy and whimsy it brings to any space is remarkable.Gifting this to my partner was a joyous moment. The notion of a lasting bouquet appealed to her, and the shared experience of building it together was the icing on the cake.In a nutshell, the LEGO Flower Bouquet set is a loving and creative gesture that guarantees a smile. It's a testament to your relationship that stays fresh and blooming.Ratings:Difficulty: 2/10Gift Appeal: 9/10Build Time: 4/10Value for Money: 7/10Display Worthy: 10/10Overall: 9.5/10 – A fantastic, fun-filled gift that keeps on giving!

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on February 9, 2024
reviews.reviewTitle: 5.0 out of 5 stars Lots of fun and beautiful
reviews.reviewText: This was a lot of fun to put together with my husband. It looks very beautiful once it’s been out-together, and the instructions are very easy to follow. Can’t wait to buy more of the botanical collection.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on January 2, 2024
reviews.reviewTitle: 5.0 out of 5 stars Great purchase and children love it
reviews.reviewText: This a simple likable gift for our daughter.They were able to assemble it in a short period and it is a real looking accent pieces

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on December 18, 2023
reviews.reviewTitle: 5.0 out of 5 stars Fun for adults
reviews.reviewText: Love this set. Very fragile but a beautiful way to incorporate legos into practice. I have these at work and and it's really a nice touch. For any women looking to start, these are a fun and feminine way.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on January 12, 2024
reviews.reviewText: One of my favorite lego sets. Pairs nicely with Legos other floral sets. The possibilities with this sets pieces are endless. The aspects of each flower are as real in size and beauty.The instructions are easy to follow and include a brief overview of the sets flowers and the designers.Mix with some dried flowers and a vase and it makes for an always fresh center piece to any table.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on December 28, 2023
reviews.reviewText: Bought these LEGO flowers on Amazon for my wife, and they've become a daily staple in her flower press business. She loves the vibrant colors and creative touch they add to her arrangements. A delightful and unique gift for any flower enthusiast!⭐️⭐️⭐️⭐️⭐️
Muito bom, lindo e gostoso de montar!

Siempre había querido un kit de botánica de LEGO; me gustan mucho las plantas, pero por la ubicación tamaño, entrada de luz y demás factores similares, me era imposible tener un conjunto de plantas reales en mi habitación, así que se me ocurrió buscar alguna otra alternativa.Antes de comprar este LEGO, yo desconocía por completo la existencia de este tipo de kits (que de hecho hay bastantes más) de botánica de LEGO, sin embargo LEGO siempre ha sido súper original con los kits que llegan a sacar de vez en cuando ya que los existen de todo tipo, así que en base a esa idea, decidí buscar algún kit de LEGO de plantas para ver si de casualidad encontraba algo y sí.Existe una gran variedad de kits de plantas de LEGO, en donde todos me encantaron por lo que no sabía cuál comprar primero ya que sí, quiero todos pero era obvio que por cuestiones económicas no puedo hacerlo aún de momento, así que mi primer kit inicial opté porque fuese este ya que estaba en descuento además de que me pareció muy linda la gran variedad de plantas las que hay en este kit.Además, me pareció muy lindo el detalle de que se explicase en el instructivo como algunas partes de las piezas de este kit eran recicladas de otros kits así como además muchas otras fuesen fabricadas con plástico de origen vegetal entre demás detalles curiosos, cosa que me pareció una alternativa bastante bonita y original para un futuro completamente ecológico y autosustentable en lo que será próximamente LEGO; kit completamente recomendado en relación calidad precio ✨El único 'pero' que le pondría es que, tal vez ya no para este kit, pero sí para algún otro en algún futuro o incluso que se venda por separado, me gustaría y estaría muy bien que se venda algún jarrón de LEGO para acomodar todas aquellas plantas de los kits de botánica de LEGO que alguno tenga, siento que ello le daría un toque estético demasiado lindo a cualquier colección botánica que alguno tenga 🍃✨.
Comes with great instructions, good-quality pieces, very fun to build and creative designs. Looks good in a real vase.

reviews.reviewTitle: Ein wunderschöner Bausatz für Lego-Enthusiasten und Blumenliebhaber!
reviews.reviewText: Der Lego Flower Bouquet 10280 Bausatz hat mich absolut begeistert! Als großer Lego-Fan und Blumenliebhaber war ich von diesem Set sofort fasziniert.Der Bausatz enthält eine Vielzahl von Lego-Blumenstängeln und -blüten in verschiedenen Farben und Formen. Die Details und die realistische Gestaltung der Blumen sind einfach beeindruckend. Es macht Spaß, die verschiedenen Blumen zusammenzubauen und sie dann zu einem wunderschönen Bouquet zu arrangieren.Die Qualität der Lego-Steine ist wie immer hervorragend. Sie sind robust, gut verarbeitet und passen perfekt zusammen. Das Zusammenbauen des Bouquets war ein Vergnügen, da die Steine reibungslos ineinandergriffen und das Endergebnis stabil und langlebig ist.Ein weiterer Pluspunkt ist die Anpassungsmöglichkeit des Bouquets. Man kann die Blumen nach Belieben anordnen und sogar eigene Kreationen hinzufügen. Dadurch wird das Set zu einem individuellen Kunstwerk, das man immer wieder neu gestalten kann.Das fertige Bouquet ist einfach atemberaubend. Es sieht aus wie ein echter Blumenstrauß und verleiht jedem Raum eine frische und lebendige Atmosphäre. Es ist eine großartige Möglichkeit, Blumen in Lego-Form zu genießen, ohne dass sie verwelken oder gepflegt werden müssen. Also Perfekt für mich :)Der Bausatz wird mit einer detaillierten Anleitung geliefert, die das Zusammenbauen einfach und unkompliziert macht. Auch für Lego-Anfänger ist es gut geeignet, da die Schritte klar und verständlich erklärt werden.Insgesamt kann ich den Lego Flower Bouquet 10280 Bausatz nur wärmstens empfehlen. Es ist ein wunderschönes Set für Lego-Enthusiasten und Blumenliebhaber gleichermaßen. Die Qualität, die Details und die Anpassungsmöglichkeiten sind wie geohnt hervorragend.Klare Kaufempfehlung!
